AD.name: TTL (Time to live)
AD.description: Define in second how long should this cache be persist in the system. (default to 1 hour)

AD.name: Cache Url
AD.description: Provide endpoint to build this cache

AD.name: Max Cache Size
AD.description: Provide max number of cache size. Default to 1000

AD.name: Max Connections
AD.description: Defines the maximum number of connections allowed overall. This value only applies to the number of connections from a particular instance of HttpConnectionManager.

AD.name: Max Host Connections
AD.description: Defines the maximum number of connections allowed per host configuration. These values only apply to the number of connections from a particular instance of HttpConnectionManager.
